message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this product. Given its incredible value, I believe a starting price of $1,600,000 is fair.  What are your thoughts?
I appreciate the offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1,200,000. I'm really interested in the product, but I'm on a tight budget.
Bob, I understand your budget constraints, but my original asking price reflects the true value of this product.  How about we meet in the middle at $1,400,000?
I appreciate your willingness to meet in the middle, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1,200,000. I really need to stay within my budget.
